com.vectorprint.report.itext.style

Interface StylerFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DocumentAware, ImageLoaderAware, LayerManagerAware
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatamappingProcessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatamappingProcessor, BaseReportGenerator, DefaultStylerFactory, EventHelper

    public interface StylerFactory
extends DocumentAware, ImageLoaderAware, LayerManagerAware
    Responsible for providing ReportGenerators and ElementProducers with stylers.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
